7.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Prostration while reciting the Qur'an

hadiths.text: This tradition has also been transmitted by Zaid b. Thabit through a different chain of narrators to the same effect. Abu Dawud said:Zaid was imam (in a prayer) and he did not make prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ لَمْ يَرَ السُّجُودَ فِي الْمُفَصَّلِ
chapter.eng-name: A View That There Is No Prostration In Mufassal Surahs
